markdownRemark.html:
A bit of notification,
This page’s content is moved to Http://iris.etealune.net,
There you can find this data along with other cards which I neglected before.
Thank you, and sorry for the inconvenience.
Regards,
~Hourai Etealune~

<!– These card released along with saga 9 in ECOid

Hallelujah Location: Iron South Upper

Card List:

Urd & Collins
Rarity: Super Rare
Position: Armor
Attributes
None
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Affection 30 40 50 60 70
Rating: ★★★★★★★★
This card will raise your Affection abilities by 30 at R0, which is you get a level 2 Release ability just using this card. I’t kinda useless at level 1 or 2, and normally you must work to get it to level 3, which you need either 3 of this, or combine it with Darling & Honey card. If you manage to do that, You’ll get a 1000 HP bonus, which is quite big. This Card scored lower than Darling&Honey mainly because it’s using Armor slot, where you can have many other good card abilities compared with what you can use at necklace.

Darling & Honey
Rarity: Super Rare
Position: Chest
Attributes
None
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Affection 30 40 50 60 70
Rating: ★★★★★★★★★
Same with Urd & Collins, this card will raise your Affection abilities by 30 at R0, which is you get a level 2 Release ability just using this card. I’t kinda useless at level 1 or 2, and normally you must work to get it to level 3, which you need either 3 of this, or combine it with Urd & Collins card. If you manage to do that, You’ll get a 1000 HP bonus, which is quite big. This card is preferable than Urd & Collins, since this card will eat up your necklace slot, which have less important variation of card that can be slotted there.

Rarity: Rare
Position: Weapon
Attributes
None
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Short Range Burst 25 32 40 45 50
Rating:★★★★
While at R0 it’s far superior when compared with Blademaster, They have the same vector at R4. This card score higher than blademaster solely because that reason (and since it’s usually almost impossible to get R4 at EX, anyway). Even using this, it’s extremely hard to get into recommended lv at lv 5
Note: Card image change on R2

Tsukuyomi
Rarity: Rare
Position: Weapon
Attributes
None
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Magic Burst 25 32 40 45 50
Rating:★★★
Still useless due to it’s insignificant Matk boost.
Note: Card image change on R2

Fox Girl
Rarity: Rare
Position: Weapon
Attributes
None
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Long Range Burst 25 32 40 45 50
Rating:★★★
Same with Short Range Burst, It’s kinda useless on low level. Furthermore, this card can only be equipped at weapons, which means only commando need this card (Gunner have Absolute attack), which makes this card gets very situational usage.
Note: Card image change on R2

Marionette Nymph
Rarity: Uncommon
Position: Weapon/armor
Attributes
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
6 6 6 6 6
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Weapon Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Armor Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Rating:★★★★★★
A good card to exploit elemental weaknesses. This card is pretty popular because it’s wind property. Wind are pretty popular because there’s many intermediate to high level monster that have fire affinity for their defense (most robots from ruins, knight monster from abyss, etc)

Marionette Icy
Rarity: Uncommon
Position: Weapon/armor
Attributes
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
6 6 6 6 6
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Weapon Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Armor Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Rating:★★★★
A good card to exploit elemental weaknesses. Though useful, there’s not that many monster with earth attribute that can be used for hunting, making this card a bit useless.

Marionette Homura
Rarity: Uncommon
Position: Weapon/armor
Attributes
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
6 6 6 6 6
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Weapon Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Armor Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Rating:★★★★
A good card to exploit elemental weaknesses. A bit more useful than water, especially you can use this for hunting/farming at waterlayer/submarine cave.

Marionette Pino
Rarity: Uncommon
Position: Weapon/armor
Attributes
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
6 6 6 6 6
Release Ability
R0 R1 R2 R3 R4
Weapon Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Armor Builder 20 25 28 30 32
Rating:★★★★★
A good card to exploit elemental weaknesses. The second most used elements. This card will be used mainly at Platinum at lower level. At high level, This card will proof it’s usefulness when you’re up against dryad series if you’re looking for tonic (for quest 99)
